text: Tian ke [zhu 1][huo jiuji pin] zhi neng gei qiongren, pinmin [zhu 2], wei ci gongzuo zhe [shoufa tian ke zhe huo shoufa jiuji pin zhe], xiyin qi xin qingxiang [yisilan jiao] zhe, wei nuli shushen, qian zhai zhe, wei an la zhi dao gongzuo zhe, luxing zaojie zhe, zhe shi an la de faling. An la shi quanzhi de, zui ruizhi de.
